column4: i need an answer fast how do i turn on SCSI emulation im tired of rippingcds at 0.6x how do i enable it
i need an answer fast how do i turn on SCSI emulation im tired of rippingcds at 0.6x how do i enable it
first try sudo hdparm -d1 /dev/hdc (assuming hdc is your cdrom)
that would probably be a good check for further functionality, yes :)
